de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr

Class LexSemRelationComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TermSimilarityMeasureBase
      • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TextSimilarityMeasureBase
        • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.LexSemResourceComparator
          • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.LexSemRelationComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimilarityMeasure, TermSimilarityMeasure, TextSimilarityMeasure

    public class LexSemRelationComparator
extends LexSemResourceComparator
    Comparator that matches entities that are in direct lexical or semantic relation. Returns 1.0 if they are in such a relation and 0.0 otherwise.
    Author:
    zesch
